title: How to Draw a Rose Petal

steps.headline: Start by sketching a rough shape of a petal by drawing a circle.
Over the sketched circle draw a roundish shape with waved edges.
steps.description: Erase the sketch and you’re done! Is as simple as that.

steps.headline: Now let’s make a composition with different petal shapes.
steps.description: Next to the already drawn petal shape, sketch some more circles of different sizes.

steps.headline: Over these circles draw again roundish shapes with waved edges.
steps.description: Try to make them in various shapes.

steps.headline: Erase all the sketches and add some color.
steps.description: Color them in any way and color you wish to. Enjoy!

text: Start by sketching a rough shape of a petal by drawing a circle.  Over the sketched circle draw a roundish shape with waved edges. Erase the sketch and you’re done! Is as simple as that. Now let’s make a composition with different petal shapes. Next to the already drawn petal shape, sketch some more circles of different sizes. Over these circles draw again roundish shapes with waved edges. Try to make them in various shapes. Erase all the sketches and add some color. Color them in any way and color you wish to. Enjoy! Finished.
sentences: Start by sketching a rough shape of a petal by drawing a circle.
Over the sketched circle draw a roundish shape with waved edges.
Erase the sketch and you’re done!
Now let’s make a composition with different petal shapes.
Next to the already drawn petal shape, sketch some more circles of different sizes.
Over these circles draw again roundish shapes with waved edges.
Try to make them in various shapes.
Erase all the sketches and add some color.
Color them in any way and color you wish to.
